title: Was gonna get headhunter akali then I realized
body:
Her ult and E procing Q got nerfed didnt it?
Or did they leave E procing Q in and didn't make her a completely clunky mess?

replies.body: Yeah, they changed that a while back, E no longer procs Q.

yeah just tried to play her in a bot match real quick to see
god thats so fucking clunky

Welp fuck skins for her I guess now.
Was gonna get headhunter just for the recall animation being cool but NOPE.

Akali is legit weak right now, and there is not a reason to pick her in any situation over other champions.

She needs to stay weak however, due to her kit.

And? So you just dump her? Hell no, you find a way to make her viable, that is what a true main does. Mordekaiser unviable now? Nah, just change my build path (or in my case don't), Teemo sucks, fine, I pick him into counters and remove the opponent top from the game. Volibear isn't a top, the fuck he ain't. A true main doesn't care about nerfs, if they enjoy their character, they will simply work around them.

Teemo and Mordekaiser are both viable champions bud, those were shitty examples

And no, "True Mains" will stop playing their champion if they're is literally zero reason to pick them over other champions.

The amount of champions in that category is low, but they exist (Evelynn, Akali, Miss Fortune, Darius until his buffs hit)

Edit: Volibear top was more popular than jungle until recently.

lol mk buddy.

Based on that, and your flat out statistical lies, and lack of knowledge (Last time teemo was played in the pro scene, he was built mostly AP, and once full AD. This bruiser shit is an awful build that zero people use.), I can only assume you are new.

Have a good day, Summoner.

No I've actually owned akali since her release.
lol
I just found her less fun to play than jax/irelia/swain top so I didn't play her much.
Leblanc/katarina was more fun mid.

She's a mechanically boring champion and her E has always been a worthless ability I wish they'd rework it already.

> [{quoted}](name=TenSlashTen,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xQVg794G,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2015-03-27T15:44:49.668+0000)

> Leblanc/katarina was more fun mid.

Oh, ok, you are good then.

I can feel the hate getting downvoted by FoTM. Despite what many think, Akali has a very HIGH skill cap ceiling, so if you don't even play her (FoTM players you dont count, sorry) dont QQ on her. Guarentee you I have more played games with Akali than any of you and would rek you in lane (unless you play morde, then i'll farm til 6 then go rek your botlane and come back and rek you after im fed).

3 tanks? the point of akali is getting fed before champions have a chance to build tanky and kill carries. If your playing akali and are trying to initiate/kill tanks, your playing her wrong.

I was actually doing just fine with Akali post-nerf. Only reason I'm hesitant to play her now is because there are a minimum of 3 tanks per team now, so not as many squishies(dunno how Akali fares against tanks, don't wanna know either)

Akali mains from last season are happy with the change (besides the R, but even we agree that the range on that was a bit ridic (outranging basically every spell/adc aa in the game). Not only did it remove the 90%ish banrate but it also sepereated noobs trying to gain free elo with her and the mains/skilled akali players. No longer do I see trash players carrying games, but at the same time I find her still a very strong hypercarry who wins me almost every game. Too bad I dont play her much this season (even before her nerf).
